    • Constructor Detail

      • Deck

        public Deck(java.util.List<T> list)
        Creates a new Deck made up of the elements of the given list.
        Parameters:
        list - the elements to build a Deck from. This may have repetitions. Not null, not empty.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - list is null or empty

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public T draw()
       throws NoDrawableCardException
        Draws a card from this deck. If no card is drawable, the discard pile is shuffled into the deck, then a card is drawn.
        Returns:
        the drawn card. Not null.
        Throws:
        NoDrawableCardException - no card to be drawn and no card in the discard pile.

      • discard

        public void discard(T card)
        Puts the given card into this deck's discard pile.
        Parameters:
        card - the card to discard. Not null, must belong to this deck.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - the given card does not belong to this deck.

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Checks for the presence of drawable cards.
        Returns:
        whether or not the deck is empty

      • reshuffle

        public void reshuffle()
        Shuffles this deck's discard pile together with the main deck.

      • getDrawableCardsAmount

        public int getDrawableCardsAmount()
        Returns the amount od drawable cards in this deck.
        Returns:
        amount of drawable cards

      • getDiscardPile

        public java.util.List<T> getDiscardPile()
        Returns all the cards in this deck's discard pile. Order is not ensured.
        Returns:
        discarded cards

      • generateDeckData

        public DeckData generateDeckData()
        Generates a DeckData object for this deck

        public T getCardFromId(int cardId)
